snippet.title: Rise Eterna War || Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise Eterna War tells the bloody tale of Arthbane, a great general who led the last stand to reclaim his homeland, Ars Rare, from foreign invaders. Play as Arthbane, a decade prior to the events of Rise Eterna, rallying loyalists in a desperate bid to seize the capital, Gaiacus.

Guide Arthbane's campaign against the occupying Athracian army, balancing strategy and resources to defeat cunning rival generals. Recruit up to 16 units and visit the Chuckwagon to feed your troops. Rally 11 legendary heroes - both new and returning favorites - and lead them to battle through over 40 missions.

Play Rise Eterna War now:
⚫ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2739930/Rise_Eterna_War
🔴 https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/rise-eterna-war-switch/
🔵 https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010806
🟢 https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/rise-eterna-war/9nxfzqzggh6x
